skill.name: opentrons-integration
skill.description: Lab automation platform for Flex/OT-2 robots. Write Protocol API v2 protocols, liquid handling, hardware modules (heater-shaker, thermocycler), labware management, for automated pipetting workflows.
skill.summary: Lab automation platform for Flex/OT-2 robots. Write Protocol API v2 protocols, liquid handling, hard...
skill.author: K-Dense Inc.

security_audit.summary: No data theft, exfiltration, or malicious execution patterns found. Files contain only Opentrons protocol templates and API reference material.

content.user_title: Build Opentrons protocols for Flex and OT-2
content.value_statement: You need a reliable starting point for Opentrons Protocol API v2 scripts. This skill provides templates and API guidance for common lab automation tasks.
actual_capabilities: Provides a basic protocol template with metadata and run() structure
Includes a PCR setup template using the thermocycler module
Includes a serial dilution template across plate rows
Documents key Protocol API v2 methods for labware, instruments, and modules
Shows liquid definition and load_liquid usage for tracking
limitations: No runtime validation of labware or module availability
Templates target API level 2.19 and Flex examples by default
No error handling beyond comments and simple flow
Does not include integration with external data systems

use_cases.title: PCR setup automation
use_cases.description: Draft a PCR preparation and thermocycling protocol for Flex or OT-2.

use_cases.title: Serial dilution workflows
use_cases.description: Generate a serial dilution script with defined volumes and mix steps.

use_cases.title: Protocol onboarding
use_cases.description: Provide a clean starter template for new Opentrons users.

prompt_templates.title: Starter protocol
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a basic Opentrons Protocol API v2 template for OT-2 with one transfer from A1 to B1 and clear comments.

prompt_templates.title: Serial dilution
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a serial dilution protocol across one row with 1:2 dilution, 100 uL transfers, and mix after each step.

prompt_templates.title: PCR setup
prompt_templates.prompt: Draft a PCR setup protocol that distributes master mix, adds 8 samples, and runs a 35 cycle thermocycler profile.

prompt_templates.title: Module control
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a protocol that uses a temperature module for incubation and then transfers samples to a plate for analysis.

output_examples.input: Make a PCR setup protocol for 8 samples on Flex
output: Loads thermocycler module and PCR plate
Ends with a 4 C hold and lid open

best_practices: Specify API level and robot type in metadata
Use protocol.comment for clear execution logs
Simulate protocols before running on hardware
anti_patterns: Hardcoding labware without checking deck layout
Using volumes that exceed pipette limits
Skipping tip usage planning for long runs

faq.question: Is this compatible with Flex and OT-2?
faq.answer: Yes, templates reference both, but you must select the correct robotType and labware.

faq.question: What are the main limits of these templates?
faq.answer: They are examples and do not include validation, error handling, or custom hardware checks.

faq.question: Can I integrate this with LIMS or data files?
faq.answer: Not directly. You can extend the scripts to load data from files or external systems.

faq.question: Does it access or transmit my data?
faq.answer: No. The files contain only local protocol logic and documentation.

faq.question: What if my protocol fails in simulation?
faq.answer: Check API version, labware definitions, and volumes against pipette limits.

faq.question: How does it compare to Opentrons docs?
faq.answer: It is a focused template set plus a compact API reference for quick starts.
